api_list.name: Create a Page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion-api-official.p.rapidapi.com/v1/pages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion-api-official.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query a database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion-api-official.p.rapidapi.com/v1/databases/id/query"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion-api-official.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
